analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i byams pa chen po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Why is that?🔽It is because they do not see that great love in which they should train.

original: snying rje chen po la mi slob ste /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la mi slob ste /
translated: “They do not train in great compassion.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i snying rje chen po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not consider that great compassion in which they should train.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi slob ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not consider those eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas in which they should train.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni; rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob ste /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni; rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @83b ngo;/
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not consider that result of stream enterer in which they should train.

analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob ste /
translated: “They do not train in the result of once-returner.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not consider that result of once-returner in which they should train.

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not see that fruit of non-returner to which they should train.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slob ste /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slob ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: “They do not train in the state of a worthy one.

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i dgra bcom pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not see that state of a worthy one to which they should train.

analyzed: rang byang chub la mi slob ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rang byang chub de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not see that pratyekabuddha’s awakening to which they should train.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi slob ste /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi slob ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not see that knowledge of path aspects to which they should train.

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi slob ste /
translated: He does not train in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: In this way, he does not see even that knowledge of all aspects on which he should train.

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, asked the elder Subhūti, “Venerable monk Subhūti,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci'i phyir na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / @84a *// ci'i phyir na 'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na nam mkha'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi @85a *//

analyzed: ci'i phyir na 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

translated: Why do they not see consciousness?

analyzed: ci'i phyir na ming dang gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na sred pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na len pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na srid pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see appropriation?🔽Why is it that they do not see existence?

analyzed: ci'i phyir na rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the perfection of generosity?

original: ci'i phyir na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ci'i phyir na bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

translated: Why do they not see the transcendent perfection of wisdom?🔽Why do they not see the emptiness of internal phenomena?

analyzed: ci'i phyir na phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su @85b mi mthong / ci'i phyir na phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the emptiness of external phenomena?🔽Why do they not see the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena?

analyzed: ci'i phyir na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the emptiness of emptiness?

original: ci'i phyir na chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ci'i phyir na don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the emptiness of great extent?🔽Why do they not see the emptiness of ultimate reality?

analyzed: ci'i phyir na 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the emptiness of the unconditioned as truly existent?

analyzed: ci'i phyir na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

original: ci'i phyir na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

original: ci'i phyir na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the emptiness of all phenomena as truly existent?

original: ci'i phyir na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ci'i phyir na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the emptiness of specific characteristics as truly existent?🔽Why is it that they do not see the emptiness of nonapprehension as truly existent?

analyzed: ci'i phyir na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the emptiness of nonthings as truly existent?

original: ci'i phyir na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ci'i phyir na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
