original: ci'i phyir na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ci'i phyir na yang dag par spong ba rnams @86a *//
analyzed: ci'i phyir na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na yang dag par spong ba rnams @86a *//
translated: Why is it that they do not see the applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the right efforts?

original: ci'i phyir na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ci'i phyir na dbang po rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na dbang po rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the legs of miraculous power?🔽Why is it that they do not see the faculties?

original: ci'i phyir na stobs rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na stobs rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the powers?

original: ci'i phyir na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the branches of enlightenment?

original: ci'i phyir na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the noble eightfold path?

original: ci'i phyir na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the noble truths?

original: ci'i phyir na bsam gtan rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ci'i phyir na tshad med pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na bsam gtan rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na tshad med pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the concentrations?🔽Why do they not see the immeasurables?

original: ci'i phyir na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the formless absorptions?

original: ci'i phyir na rnam par thar pa brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na rnam par thar pa brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the eight deliverances?

original: ci'i phyir na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the nine serial absorptions?

original: ci'i phyir na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to deliverance?

original: ci'i phyir na mngon par shes pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na mngon par shes pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why do they not see the clairvoyances?

original: ci'i phyir na ting nge 'dzin rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na ting nge 'dzin rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the meditative stabilities as real?

original: ci'i phyir na gzungs kyi sgo rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na gzungs kyi sgo rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the dhāraṇī gateways as real?

original: ci'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs @86b pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs @86b pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the ten powers of the tathāgatas as real?

original: ci'i phyir na mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the four fearlessnesses as real?

original: ci'i phyir na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽ci'i phyir na byams pa chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ci'i phyir na byams pa chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the four detailed and thorough knowledges as real?🔽Why is it that they do not see great love as real?

original: ci'i phyir na snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see great compassion as real?

original: ci'i phyir na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha as real?

original: ci'i phyir na thams cad shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na thams cad shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the knowledge of all aspects as real?

original: ci'i phyir na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the knowledge of path aspects?

original: ci'i phyir na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Why is it that they do not see the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //🔽tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: it is because form is empty of form.🔽Feeling is empty of feeling.

original: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo //
translated: Perception is empty of perception.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //
translated: Formations are empty of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Consciousness is empty of consciousness.

original: mig mig gis stong ngo //🔽rna ba rna bas stong ngo //🔽sna snas stong ngo //
analyzed: mig mig gis stong ngo // rna ba rna bas stong ngo // sna snas stong ngo //
translated: The eyes are empty of the eyes.🔽The ears are empty of the ears.

original: lce lces stong ngo //
analyzed: lce lces stong ngo //
translated: The nose is empty of the nose.🔽The tongue is empty of the tongue.

original: lus lus kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus lus kyis stong ngo //
translated: The body is empty of the body.

original: yid yid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid yid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The mind is empty of the mind.

original: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Form is empty of form.

original: sgra sgras stong ngo //🔽dri dris stong ngo //🔽ro ros stong ngo //
analyzed: sgra sgras stong ngo // dri dris stong ngo // ro ros stong ngo //
translated: Sound is empty of sound.🔽Smell is empty of smell.🔽Taste is empty of taste.

original: reg reg gis stong ngo //
analyzed: reg reg gis stong ngo //
translated: Touch is empty of touch.

original: chos chos kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos chos kyis stong ngo //
translated: Mental objects are empty of mental objects.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Eye consciousness is empty of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i @87a *//🔽rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i @87a *// rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Ear consciousness is empty of ear consciousness.🔽Nose consciousness is empty of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Tongue consciousness is empty of tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Body consciousness is empty of body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Mind consciousness is empty of mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Eye contact is empty of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Ear contact is empty of ear contact.🔽Nose contact is empty of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Tongue contact is empty of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Body contact is empty of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
translated: mind-contact is empty of mind-contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of nose-contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of nose-contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of tongue-contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of tongue-contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of body-contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of body-contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of mind-contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of mind-contact.

original: sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong @87b ngo //
analyzed: sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong @87b ngo //
translated: The earth element is empty of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The water element is empty of the water element.

original: me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ngo //🔽rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ngo // rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The fire element is empty of the fire element.🔽The wind element is empty of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The space element is empty of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The consciousness element is empty of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ngo //
analyzed: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ngo //
translated: Ignorance is empty of ignorance.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //
translated: Formations are empty of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Consciousness is empty of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Name and form are empty of name and form.

original: skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ngo //
analyzed: skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ngo //
translated: The six sense sources are empty of the six sense sources.

original: reg pa reg pas stong ngo //
analyzed: reg pa reg pas stong ngo //
translated: Contact is empty of contact.

original: tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //🔽sred pa sred pas stong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo // sred pa sred pas stong ngo //
translated: Sensation is empty of sensation.🔽Craving is empty of craving.

original: len pa len pas stong ngo //🔽srid pa srid pas stong ngo //
analyzed: len pa len pas stong ngo // srid pa srid pas stong ngo //
translated: Clinging is empty of clinging.🔽Becoming is empty of becoming.

original: skye ba skye bas stong ngo //
analyzed: skye ba skye bas stong ngo //
translated: Birth is empty of birth.

original: rga shi rga shis stong ngo //
analyzed: rga shi rga shis stong ngo //
translated: old age and death are empty of old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of morality is empty of the perfection of morality.🔽The perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of effort is empty of the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of meditation is empty of the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //🔽nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //🔽phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness.🔽Outer emptiness is empty of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is empty of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis @88a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis @88a *//
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is empty of the emptiness of emptiness,

original: stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the great is empty of the great,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the ultimate is empty of the ultimate,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the conditioned is empty of the conditioned,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned is empty of the unconditioned,🔽the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is empty of what is beyond extremes,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is empty of what is beginningless and endless,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is empty of what is not to be discarded,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: and the emptiness of a basic nature is empty of a basic nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is empty of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is empty of the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is empty of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-entities is empty of the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is empty of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is empty of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are empty of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The right efforts are empty of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the bases of supernatural powers are empty of the bases of supernatural powers,

original: dbang po rnams @88b dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dbang po rnams @88b dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the faculties are empty of the faculties,

original: stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the powers are empty of the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the branches of enlightenment are empty of the branches of enlightenment,

original: lam lam gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lam lam gyis stong ngo //
translated: the path is empty of the path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the noble truths are empty of the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the meditative stabilizations are empty of the meditative stabilizations,

original: tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the immeasurables are empty of the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the liberations are empty of the liberations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness, signless, and wishless gates of liberation are empty of the emptiness, signless, and wishless gates of liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the higher perceptions are empty of the higher perceptions,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the meditative stabilities are empty of the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are empty of the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are empty of the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the fearlessnesses are empty of the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: and the detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ngo //
analyzed: byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ngo //
translated: great love is empty of great love,

original: @89a *// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo //
analyzed: @89a *// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo //
translated: great compassion is empty of great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: knowledge of all aspects is empty of knowledge of all aspects,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: knowledge of the aspects of the path is empty of knowledge of the aspects of the path,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: koo shi ka /🔽gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: koo shi ka / gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Kauśika,🔽form is empty of the emptiness of form,🔽feeling is empty of the emptiness of feeling,

original: 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: perception is empty of the emptiness of perception,

original: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of volitional factors is not seen as the emptiness of volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of consciousness is not seen as the emptiness of consciousness,

original: mig stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rna ba stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rna ba stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sna stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the eyes is not seen as the emptiness of the eyes,🔽the emptiness of the ears is not seen as the emptiness of the ears,🔽the emptiness of the nose is not seen as the emptiness of the nose,

original: lce stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the tongue is not seen as the emptiness of the tongue,

original: lus stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of the body is not seen as the emptiness of the body,

original: yid stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @89b ngo //
analyzed: yid stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong @89b ngo //
translated: and the emptiness of the thinking mind is not seen as the emptiness of the thinking mind.

original: gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of form does not see the emptiness of form.

original: sgra stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽dri stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgra stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dri stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of sound does not see the emptiness of sound.🔽The emptiness of smell does not see the emptiness of smell.

original: ro stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ro stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of taste does not see the emptiness of taste.

original: reg stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: reg stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of touch does not see the emptiness of touch.

original: chos stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of dharmas does not see the emptiness of dharmas.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the eye consciousness does not see the emptiness of the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the ear consciousness does not discern the emptiness of the ear consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the nose consciousness does not discern the emptiness of the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the tongue consciousness does not discern the emptiness of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the body consciousness does not discern the emptiness of the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the mind consciousness does not discern the emptiness of the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the composite of eye contact does not see the emptiness of the composite of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis @90a *//
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis @90a *//
translated: The emptiness of the composite of ear contact

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: does not see the emptiness of the composite of ear contact.🔽The emptiness of the composite of nose contact

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: does not see the emptiness of the composite of nose contact.🔽The emptiness of the composite of tongue contact

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: does not see the emptiness of the composite of tongue contact.🔽The emptiness of the composite of body contact

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: does not see the emptiness of the composite of body contact.🔽The emptiness of the composite of mind contact

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: does not see the emptiness of the composite of mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the causal condition of eye contact does not see the emptiness of the causal condition of eye contact.🔽The emptiness of the causal condition of ear contact does not see the emptiness of the causal condition of ear contact.🔽The emptiness of the causal condition of nose contact does not see the emptiness of the causal condition of nose contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the causal condition of tongue contact does not see the emptiness of the causal condition of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @90b ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @90b ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the body as the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the mind as the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the mind.

original: sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyis sa'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyis sa'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the earth element as the emptiness of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the water element as the emptiness of the water element.

original: me'i khams stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: me'i khams stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the fire element as the emptiness of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyis rlung gi khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyis rlung gi khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the wind element does not discern the emptiness of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the space element does not discern the emptiness of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the consciousness element does not discern the emptiness of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of ignorance does not discern the emptiness of ignorance.

original: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of volitional factors does not discern the emptiness of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of consciousness does not discern the emptiness of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyis ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyis ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of name and form as the emptiness of name and form.

original: skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyis skye mched drug stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽reg pa stong pa nyid kyis reg @91a *//
analyzed: skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyis skye mched drug stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // reg pa stong pa nyid kyis reg @91a *//
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the six sense fields as the emptiness of the six sense fields.

original: pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of contact as the emptiness of contact.

original: tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of feeling as the emptiness of feeling.

original: sred pa stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sred pa stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of craving as the emptiness of craving.

original: len pa stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: len pa stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of appropriation as the emptiness of appropriation.

original: srid pa stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: srid pa stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of existence as the emptiness of existence.

original: skye ba stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: skye ba stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of birth does not see the emptiness of birth.

original: rga shi stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rga shi stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of old age and death does not see the emptiness of old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of generosity does not see the emptiness of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of discipline does not see the emptiness of the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of patience does not see the emptiness of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is not the emptiness of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The perfection of concentration is not the emptiness of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi @91b pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi @91b pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena is not the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of external phenomena is not the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of external and internal phenomena is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not seen as the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of great extent is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not seen as the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽The emptiness of the unlimited is not seen as the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rang bzhin @92a *//
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rang bzhin @92a *//
translated: The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is not seen as the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-dispersal is not seen as the emptiness of non-dispersal.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is not seen as the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-things is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is not seen as the emptiness of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not seen as the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the applications of mindfulness is not seen as the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the right efforts is not seen as the emptiness of the right efforts.🔽The emptiness of the bases of supernatural powers is not seen as the emptiness of the bases of supernatural powers.

original: dbang po stong pa nyid kyis dbang po stong pa @92b nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dbang po stong pa nyid kyis dbang po stong pa @92b nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the faculties is not seen as the emptiness of the faculties.

original: stobs stong pa nyid kyis stobs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: stobs stong pa nyid kyis stobs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the powers is not seen as the emptiness of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the branches of enlightenment does not see the emptiness of the branches of enlightenment.

original: lam stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lam stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the path does not see the emptiness of the path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the noble truths does not see the emptiness of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the concentrations does not see the emptiness of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyis tshad med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyis tshad med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the immeasurables does not see the emptiness of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the formless absorptions does not see the emptiness of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the liberations does not discern the emptiness of the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the serial formulations does not discern the emptiness of the serial formulations.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis mngon par @93a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis mngon par @93a *//
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of the door of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness does not discern the emptiness of the door of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness.

original: shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the superknowledges does not discern the emptiness of the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the concentrations does not discern the emptiness of the concentrations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the dhāraṇī gateway does not discern the emptiness of the dhāraṇī gateway.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the powers of the tathāgatas does not discern the emptiness of the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyis mi 'jig pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyis mi 'jig pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of fearlessness does not discern the emptiness of fearlessness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽byams pa chen po stong pa nyid kyis byams pa chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // byams pa chen po stong pa nyid kyis byams pa chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the correct understandings does not discern the emptiness of the correct understandings.🔽The emptiness of great love does not discern the emptiness of great love.

original: snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of great compassion does not discern the emptiness of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the buddhadharmas does not see the emptiness of the buddhadharmas.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects does not see the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the knowledge of paths does not see the emptiness of the knowledge of paths.

original: rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa @93b nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa @93b nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects does not see the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ltar gang stong pa nyid 'di la mi slob pa de ni /🔽gnyis su byar med par stong pa nyid la slob pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gang stong pa nyid 'di la mi slob pa de ni / gnyis su byar med par stong pa nyid la slob pa ste /
translated: those who do not train in this emptiness🔽train in emptiness without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of form without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of feelings without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par 'du shes stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par 'du shes stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of perceptions without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par 'du byed stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par 'du byed stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of formative predispositions without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of consciousness without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par mig stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par rna ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par mig stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par rna ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the eyes without making any distinction between them;🔽they train in the emptiness of the ears without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par sna stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par sna stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the nose without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par lce stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lce stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the tongue without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par lus stong pa nyid la slob bo; ;de gnyis su byar med par yid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lus stong pa nyid la slob bo; ;de gnyis su byar med par yid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the body without making any distinction between them; they train in the emptiness of the mental faculty without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of sights without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par sgra stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par sgra stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of sound without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par dri stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par ro stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par dri stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par ro stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of smell without making any distinction between them;🔽they train in the emptiness of taste without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par reg stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par reg stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of touch without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par chos stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par chos stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of mental phenomena without making any distinction between them.🔽“They train in the emptiness of the eye consciousness without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob @94a *//🔽bo; ;de gnyis su byar med par sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob @94a *// bo; ;de gnyis su byar med par sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the ear consciousness without making any distinction between them;🔽they train in the emptiness of the nose consciousness without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the tongue consciousness without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the body consciousness without making any distinction between them;

original: de gnyis su byar med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the mental consciousness without making any distinction between these two.🔽They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the eyes without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the ears without making any distinction between these two.🔽They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the nose without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the tongue without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the body without making any distinction between these two.🔽They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the mental faculty without making any distinction between these two.🔽They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of mental consciousness without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of sights without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
