translated: “They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the ears without making any distinction between them.🔽“They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the nose without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the tongue without making any distinction between them.🔽“They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the body without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su @94b byar med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par sa'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su @94b byar med par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par sa'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the sensory element of the mental faculty without making any distinction between them.🔽“They train in the emptiness of the earth element without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par chu'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par chu'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the water element without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par me'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par me'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the fire element without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rlung gi khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rlung gi khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the element of wind without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the element of space without making any distinction between them.🔽They train in the emptiness of the element of consciousness without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par ma rig pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par ma rig pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of ignorance without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par 'du byed stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par 'du byed stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of conditioning factors without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of consciousness without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of name and form without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par skye mched drug stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par skye mched drug stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the six sense sources without making any distinction between them.🔽They train in the emptiness of contact without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of sensation without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par sred pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par sred pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of craving without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par len pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par srid pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par len pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par srid pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of appropriation without making any distinction between them.🔽They train in the emptiness of existence without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par skye ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par skye ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of birth without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rga shi stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @95a *//
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rga shi stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @95a *//
translated: They train in the emptiness of aging and death without making any distinction between them.

original: stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the perfection of generosity without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the perfection of ethical discipline without making any distinction between them.🔽They train in the emptiness of the perfection of patience without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the perfection of perseverance without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the perfection of meditative concentration without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the emptiness of internal phenomena without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the emptiness of external phenomena without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the emptiness of emptiness without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the emptiness of great extent without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the emptiness of ultimate reality without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the unconditioned without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the unlimited without making it into two.🔽They train in the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par dor ba med pa stong pa nyid @95b stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par dor ba med pa stong pa nyid @95b stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of non-dispersal without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of inherent existence without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of all phenomena without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of specific characteristics without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of non-apprehension without making it into two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities without making it into two;🔽they train in the emptiness of the essential nature of entities without making it into two;

original: de gnyis su byar med par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities without making it into two;🔽they train in the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness without making it into two;

original: de gnyis su byar med par yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the right efforts without making it into two;

original: de gnyis su byar med par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par dbang po stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par dbang po stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the legs of miraculous power without making it into two;🔽they train in the emptiness of the faculties without making it into two;

original: de gnyis su byar med par stobs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par stobs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the powers without making it into two;

original: de gnyis su byar med par byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: they train in the emptiness of the branches of enlightenment without making it into two;🔽they train in the emptiness of the path without making it into two;

original: de gnyis su byar med par lam stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lam stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the path without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the noble truths without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par bsam gtan stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par tshad med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par gzugs med @96a *//
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par bsam gtan stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par tshad med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par gzugs med @96a *//
translated: They train in the emptiness of meditative stability without making any distinction between these two.🔽They train in the emptiness of the immeasurable without making any distinction between these two.

original: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the formless absorptions without making any distinction between these two.🔽They train in the emptiness of the liberated states without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the serial absorptions without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the gateways to liberation—namely, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness—without making any distinction between these two.

original: de gnyis su byar med par mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the six superknowledges without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of meditative stabilization without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the dhāraṇī gateways without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the four fearlessnesses without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //🔽de gnyis su byar med par byams pa chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid la slob bo // de gnyis su byar med par byams pa chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges without making any distinction between them.🔽“They train in the emptiness of great love without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par snying rje chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par snying rje chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of great compassion without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: “They train in the emptiness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of all phenomena without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo //
translated: They train in the emptiness of the knowledge of path aspects without making any distinction between them.

original: de gnyis su byar med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid la @96b slob bo ////
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid la @96b slob bo ////
translated: They train in the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects without making any distinction between them.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya brgyad pa /
analyzed: bam po brgya brgyad pa /
translated: fascicle 80

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: those who train without making any distinction between the emptiness of form and those who train without making any distinction between the emptiness of feeling, perception, and volitional factors;

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / mig stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / mig stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the eyes and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of form and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of sound, smell, taste, and touch and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of dharmas and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of the eyes and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of sights and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of eye consciousness and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of the ears and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of sounds and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.

original: sna stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / lce stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / lus stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / yid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: sna stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / lce stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / lus stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / yid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of ear consciousness and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of the nose and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of smells and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of nose consciousness and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of the tongue and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of tastes and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of tongue consciousness and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of the body and the emptiness of the Tathāgata.🔽It is training without making a distinction between the emptiness of the sensory element of touches and

original: gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / dri stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / ro stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / dri stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / ro stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: It is to train without making any division in the emptiness of sound, the emptiness of smell, the emptiness of taste, the emptiness of touch,🔽and the emptiness of mental phenomena.

original: reg stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / chos stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /

translated: It is training in the emptiness of the earth element, without differentiating between them.

translated: It is to train without making any division in the emptiness of the water element. It is to train without making any division in the emptiness of the fire element. It is to train without making any division in the emptiness of the consciousness element. It is to train without making any division in the emptiness of ignorance.

translated: It is to train without making any division in the emptiness of volitional factors. It is to train without making any division in the emptiness of consciousness. It is to train without making any division in the emptiness of name and form.

original: skye mched drug stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /🔽sred pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid la gang @98a *//

translated: It is to train in the emptiness of the six sense sources without making any distinction into two. It is to train in the emptiness of contact without making any distinction into two. It is to train in the emptiness of sensation without making any distinction into two.

translated: It is to train in the emptiness of craving without making any distinction into two. It is to train in the emptiness of grasping without making any distinction into two. It is to train in the emptiness of becoming without making any distinction into two. It is to train in the emptiness of birth without making any distinction into two. It is to train in the emptiness of old age and death without making any distinction into two.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /

translated: It is training without making any division in the emptiness of the perfection of generosity,🔽training without making any division in the emptiness of the perfection of moral discipline, training without making any division in the emptiness of the perfection of patience,

translated: training without making any division in the emptiness of the perfection of perseverance, training without making any division in the emptiness of the perfection of concentration, and training without making any division in the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /

translated: it is with regard to the emptiness of internal phenomena that one trains without differentiating between training and non-training.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob @98b pa dang /

translated: It is with regard to the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /

translated: it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of what transcends limits,🔽it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of what is not discarded,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /

translated: It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the emptiness of all phenomena. It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the emptiness of defining characteristics. It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /

translated: It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the emptiness of non-things. It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the emptiness of essential nature. It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / yang dag par spang ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med @99a *//🔽par slob pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /

translated: “It is to train in the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness without making them two. It is to train in the emptiness of the right efforts without making them two. It is to train in the emptiness of the legs of miraculous power without making them two.🔽It is to train in the emptiness of the faculties without making them two. It is to train in the emptiness of the powers without making them two. It is to train in the emptiness of the branches of enlightenment without making them two.

original: lam stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /

translated: It is to train in the emptiness of the path without making it two. It is to train in the emptiness of the noble truths without making them two. It is to train in the emptiness of the meditative concentrations without making them two.

original: tshad med pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of the immeasurables,🔽it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of the formless absorptions, it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of the liberations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of the serial absorptions, and it is to train without making any division in the emptiness of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: It is to train in the emptiness of the superknowledges without making any distinction between them. It is to train in the emptiness of the meditative stabilities without making any distinction between them. It is to train in the emptiness of the dhāraṇī gateways without making any distinction between them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par @99b slob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par @99b slob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: It is to train in the emptiness of the powers of the tathāgatas without making any distinction between them. It is to train in the emptiness of the fearlessnesses without making any distinction between them. It is to train in the emptiness of the detailed and thorough knowledges without making any distinction between them.

original: byams pa chen po stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
analyzed: byams pa chen po stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /
translated: It is to train in the emptiness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha without making a distinction into two.🔽It is to train in the emptiness of omniscience without making a distinction into two.🔽It is to train in the emptiness of the knowledge of path aspects without making a distinction into two.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa de ni /

translated: It is to train in the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects without making a distinction into two.

original: gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo; ;de ni /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo; ;de ni /
translated: It is to train in the perfection of giving without making a distinction into two.

original: gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo //
translated: It is to train in the perfection of morality without making a distinction into two.

original: de ni / gnyis su byar med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo //
analyzed: de ni / gnyis su byar med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo //
translated: He trains in the perfection of patience without making it into two.

analyzed: de ni / gnyis su byar med par rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo // de ni / gnyis su byar med par chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob bo //

analyzed: de ni / gnyis su byar med par yang dag par spong ba rnams @100b la slob bo //

analyzed: de ni / gnyis su byar med par 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo //

analyzed: de ni / gnyis su byar med par 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo //

analyzed: gnyis su byar med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang slob @101b pa dang / gnyis su byar med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang slob pa dang /
translated: those who train in the transcendent perfection of diligence without making a duality of them, those who train in the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration without making a duality of them, those who train in the transcendent perfection of wisdom without making a duality of them,

translated: those who train in inner emptiness without making a duality of them, those who train in outer emptiness without making a duality of them, those who train in inner and outer emptiness without making a duality of them, those who train in the emptiness of emptiness without making a duality of them,

original: gnyis su byar med par chen po stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par don dam pa stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /🔽gnyis su byar med par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /

translated: it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of great things; it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of the ultimate; it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of conditioned things;🔽it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of unconditioned things; it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes; it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of what is without beginning or end;

translated: it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of what is not discarded; it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of nature; it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of all things;

original: gnyis su byar med par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par @102a *//
translated: it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of essential nature,🔽it is to train without making any distinction in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence,

translated: it is to train without making any distinction with regard to the noble eightfold path; it is to train without making any distinction with regard to the noble truths; it is to train without making any distinction with regard to the meditative concentrations; it is to train without making any distinction with regard to the immeasurable aspirations;

translated: It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the formless absorptions.🔽It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.🔽It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the higher cognitions.

translated: It is to train without making any distinction with regard to the meditative stabilities.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med par rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gang slob pa dang /
translated: they train without making any division in the result of once-returner, they train without making any division in the result of non-returner,🔽they train without making any division in the state of a worthy one,

original: gnyis su byar med par dgra bcom pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par rang byang chub la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par thams cad shes pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med par dgra bcom pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par rang byang chub la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par thams cad shes pa nyid la gang slob pa dang / gnyis su byar med par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /
translated: they train without making any division in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, they train without making any division in the knowledge of all aspects, they train without making any division in the knowledge of path aspects,

original: gnyis su byar med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gang slob pa de ni /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gang slob pa de ni /
translated: and they train without making any division in the knowledge of all aspects.🔽They train without making any division in the countless, limitless buddhadharmas.

original: gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la slob bo //🔽gnyis su byar med @103a *//
analyzed: gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la slob bo //🔽gnyis su byar med @103a *//
translated: They train without making any division in the perfection of giving,🔽they train without making any division in the perfection of morality, they train without making any division in the perfection of patience, they train without making any division in the perfection of perseverance, they train without making any division in the perfection of concentration,🔽and they train without making any division in the perfection of wisdom.

original: par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la gang slob pa de ni /
analyzed: par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la gang slob pa de ni /
translated: He does not train in the infinite, innumerable qualities of the Buddha.

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: dbang po rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: stobs rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo ///

analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: de ni / mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject tongue-contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject mind-contact.

original: de ni / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: de ni / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is initiated by the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is initiated by the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is initiated by the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is initiated by the mind.

original: de ni / sa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: de ni / sa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: chu'i khams yongs @111b su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: chu'i khams yongs @111b su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: me'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: me'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: rlung gi khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rlung gi khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: nam mkha'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject the consciousness element.

original: de ni / ma rig pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: de ni / ma rig pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject ignorance.

original: 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject name and form.

original: skye mched drug yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: skye mched drug yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject the six sense fields.

original: reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject contact.

original: tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject feeling.

original: sred pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: sred pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject craving.

original: len pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: len pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject appropriation.

original: srid pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: srid pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject existence.

original: skye ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo; ;rga shi yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: skye ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo; ;rga shi yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject birth. He does not train in order to grasp or reject old age and death.

original: de ni / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol @112a *//
analyzed: de ni / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol @112a *//
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject the perfection of generosity.

original: tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject the perfection of moral discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to grasp or reject the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: they do not train in order to grasp or reject the perfection of perseverance,🔽they do not train in order to grasp or reject the perfection of concentration,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo; ;shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo; ;shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: they do not train in order to grasp or reject the perfection of wisdom,

original: de ni / nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: de ni / nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: they do not train in order to grasp or reject inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: they do not train in order to grasp or reject outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: they do not train in order to grasp or reject inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: they do not train in order to grasp or reject the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: they do not train in order to grasp or reject great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo; ;mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo; ;mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi @112b slob bo; ;dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi @112b slob bo; ;dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de ni / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: de ni / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to appropriate or to reject the right efforts.🔽He does not train in order to appropriate or to reject the feet of supernatural power.

original: dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to appropriate or to reject the faculties.

original: stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to appropriate or to reject the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to appropriate or to reject the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽de ni 'phags pa'i bden @113a *//🔽pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // de ni 'phags pa'i bden @113a *// pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to appropriate or to reject the noble eightfold path.🔽He does not train in order to appropriate or to reject the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in order to appropriate or to reject the meditative absorptions.

original: tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to cease the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to cease the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to cease the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to cease the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to cease the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to cease the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to cease the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽byams pa chen po yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // byams pa chen po yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the great love.

original: @113b snying rje chen po yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: @113b snying rje chen po yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: de ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the result of stream enterer.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the fruit of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the fruit of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rang byang chub yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Is it that one does not train in order to appropriate or to terminate the applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Is it that one does not train in order to appropriate or to terminate the right efforts?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /🔽dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam / dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Is it that one does not train in order to appropriate or to terminate the legs of manifestation?🔽Is it that one does not train in order to appropriate or to terminate the faculties?

original: stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Is it that one does not train in order to appropriate or to terminate the powers?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the branches of awakening?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the noble eightfold path?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the truths of the noble ones?

original: bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the meditative concentrations?

original: tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the immeasurable aspirations?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the formless absorptions?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of liberation?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the bases of mastery?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the liberations?

original: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i @117a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i @117a *//
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the totalities?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the emptiness?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the signless?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the wishless?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the composite?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the noncomposite?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the conditioned?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the aspects of the unconditioned?

original: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or reject the meditative absorptions?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or reject the [five] kinds of supernormal knowledge?

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or reject the meditative stabilities?

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or reject the dhāraṇī gateways? Are they not trained in order to appropriate or reject the [ten] powers of the tathāgatas?

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or reject the [four] fearlessnesses?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /🔽byams pa chen po yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam / byams pa chen po yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the correct understandings?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon great love?

original: snying rje chen po yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon great compassion?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras @117b bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /

translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the fruit of entering the stream?🔽Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth?

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they not trained in order to appropriate or abandon the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth?

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /

original: rang byang chub yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rang byang chub yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam /

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni / gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: 'du shes yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'du shes yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i @118b phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject contact at the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

translated: They do not train in order to grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.🔽They do not train in order to grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.🔽They do not train in order to grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: sa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: sa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: chu'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: chu'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: me'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: me'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: rlung gi khams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
