original: ma rig pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: ma rig pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: ming dang gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

analyzed: len pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: srid pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: srid pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //

original: skye ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: skye ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject birth.

original: rga shi yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rga shi yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to reject the perfection of morality.🔽They do not train in order to appropriate or to reject the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to reject the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @119b yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @119b yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to reject the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to reject the perfection of wisdom.🔽They do not train in order to appropriate or to reject inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or to reject outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of the external and the internal in order to acquire it or reject it.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of emptiness in order to acquire it or reject it.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of great extent in order to acquire it or reject it.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of ultimate reality in order to acquire it or reject it.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena in order to acquire it or reject it.🔽They do not train in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena in order to acquire it or reject it.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of the unlimited in order to acquire it or reject it.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end in order to acquire it or reject it.🔽They do not train in the emptiness of inherent existence in order to acquire it or reject it.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of non-rejection in order to grasp or reject it.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of inherent existence in order to grasp or reject it.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of all phenomena in order to grasp or reject it.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi @120a *//
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi @120a *//
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of defining characteristics in order to grasp or reject it.

original: slob bo; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: slob bo; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of non-apprehension in order to grasp or reject it.🔽They do not train in the emptiness of non-entities in order to grasp or reject it.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in the emptiness of essential nature in order to grasp or reject it.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in the emptiness of essential nature of non-things in order to grasp it and to abandon it.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in the applications of mindfulness in order to grasp them and to abandon them.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in the right efforts in order to grasp them and to abandon them.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in the legs of miraculous power in order to grasp them and to abandon them.

original: dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in the faculties in order to grasp them and to abandon them.

original: stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in the powers in order to grasp them and to abandon them.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in the limbs of awakening in order to grasp them and to abandon them.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: He does not train in the noble eightfold path in order to grasp it and to abandon it.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the immeasurable aspirations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs @120b su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs @120b su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the stages of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
translated: They do not train in order to appropriate or reject the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation.
